item.title: Rubbish again at my doorstep, 13th February
item.description:

item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pelton Road, Greenwich

item.description:

item.title: Two potholes on road outside 13 Parkhouse., 13th February
item.description:
The potholes have been there for a while but the recent prolonged rain has made them worse. Parkhouse St is a one-way rat run so there are lots of vans and lorries and they travel quite quickly. Because the road curves, drivers don’t always see the pothole. If a wheel thuds right through the pothole, the noise and vibration affects the flats directly opposite

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parkhouse Street, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
